mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_전문가정보기본 조회 (ExprtInfoMapper.getExprtInfo) */ SELECT mbr_no ,brno ,exprt_ogdp_inst_encpt_eml ,exprt_hdof_yn ,exprt_aprv_stts_yn ,aprv_prcs_ymd ,rjct_rsn ,atch_file_id ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_EXPRT_INFO" WHERE 1=1 AND mbr_no = #{mbrNo}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_전문가정보기본 수정 (ExprtInfoMapper.updateExprtInfo) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_EXPRT_INFO" SET brno = coalesce(#{brno}, brno) ,exprt_ogdp_inst_encpt_eml = coalesce(#{exprtOgdpInstEncptEml}, exprt_ogdp_inst_encpt_eml) ,exprt_hdof_yn = coalesce(#{exprtHdofYn}, exprt_hdof_yn) ,exprt_aprv_stts_yn = coalesce(#{exprtAprvSttsYn}, exprt_aprv_stts_yn) ,aprv_prcs_ymd = coalesce(#{aprvPrcsYmd}, aprv_prcs_ymd) ,rjct_rsn = coalesce(#{rjctRsn}, rjct_rsn) ,atch_file_id = coalesce(#{atchFileId}, atch_file_id) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND mbr_no = #{mbrNo}
